name: Space Western Survival
description:
Space Western Surival is my first sgame development project started way back in Unity 4 days (2013). It's been a project that's been stopped and started so much, but I've made the resolution that I'm going to finish this. After the game that inspired me (Rimworld) got a new DLC i've determined I'm going to finish this passion project.

It's not perfect, it's just me, who is not a gamedev by trade,  learning this. I'm sinking all my passion into it and I'd be glad to accept any feedback.

Thanks for helping make my dream a reality.
